mapper.insert: insert into supplier_materiel (id, supplier_id, materiel_id, price, number, time, note_taker, record_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{materielId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update supplier_materiel set supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, materiel_id = #{materielId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, supplier_id, materiel_id, price, number, time, note_taker, record_time from supplier_materiel
